attributes.action: get the London 2012 olympic logo changed.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The official London 2012 Olympic logo was unveiled today(4th June 2007) and has received constant critisism from the media and the general public. If this logo is used then England will become laughing stock worldwide. We ask the Prime Minister to put pressure on the London olympic organisation to consider redesiging the logo.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
